org.rsna.ctp.servlets

Class ServerServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rsna.servlets.Servlet
      • org.rsna.ctp.servlets.ServerServlet

  • public class ServerServlet
extends org.rsna.servlets.Servlet
    The ServerServlet. This servlet is intended for use by Ajax calls on web pages which need to know key parameters of the server (IP, port, CTP build)..
